modName: The Golden Touch - New Spells and Effect Shaders
summary: Drelas has been working on a new spell, one so dangerous that it threatens Skyrim\'s economic and financial systems. Claim it for yourself!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][size=5][b][u][color=green]Description (Version 1.0)[/color][/u][/b]
Drelas has been working on a new spell, one so dangerous that it threatens Skyrim\'s economic and financial systems. Claim it for yourself!

This spell turns dead NPCs into gold (giving them a unique shader effect). It adds gold and gold ingots to their inventory, which you can loot. The spell tome can be found in Drelas\' cottage, on a Golden Corpse.

[b][u][color=green]Description (Version 1.1)[/color][/u][/b]
Version 1.1 features an improved gold shader effect that appears more realistic. If updating from a previous version, simply overwrite the previously installed files.

[b][u][color=green]Description (Version 1.2)[/color][/u][/b]
Version 1.2 features two added spells. The complete spell list as of this version is:
- [b][color=yellow]Epidermal Suffocation[/color][/b]: If the target is below 50% health, they are transmuted to gold, frozen where they once stood.
- [b][color=yellow]Goldenflesh[/color][/b]: Significantly increases Damage Resistance, Frost Resistance, and Shock Resistance, but decreases Fire Resistance, while greatly overencumbering the caster.
- [b][color=yellow]Turn to Gold[/color][/b]: The target is turned to gold, then disintegrates into a Golden Bar.
All spell books can be located on the Golden Corpse in Drelas\' cottage.

[b][u][color=green]Installation[/color][/u][/b]
You can use the NMM, or simply extract the .rar file, and merge the contained \"Data\" folder to your Skyrim install\'s \"Data\" folder.

[b][u][color=green]Incompatibilities[/color][/u][/b]
This mod is compatible with all mods that I am aware of.

As always, don\'t forget to comment on whether you liked the mod or not. Also, comment on if it actually works, because this is my first attempt at using Archives (I usually include textures and scripts etc. as is). And, remember to check out my other mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31809][b]Brelyna Maryon Redone[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32933][b]Fists of the Mage - Unarmed Gameplay Enhanced[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31693][b]Explosive Unarmed Punches[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28565][b]Ice Form Weapons[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31744][b]The Hulk Follower[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28670][b]Weapon Enchantments Redone[/b][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31778][b]Dragon Aspect Ambient Sound Remover[/b][/url]
[/size][/font]
author: BrotherBob

files.name: The Golden Touch v1_2 - No Gold Sounds
